data.taskTitle: Implement performance optimization for task search
Implement performance optimization for task search
data.approach: Add debounce mechanism to search input to prevent filtering on every keystroke, optimize the filtering with early termination

data.taskTitle: Implement performance optimization for task search
summary: Added 150ms debounce mechanism for search input to prevent filtering on every keystroke
Implemented early termination in filter loop - stops after 150 results (the display limit)
Optimized field check order: id (shortest) → title → assignee
Immediate UI feedback preserved - clear button and match count use raw query while filtering uses debounced query
reviewFocus: Test with large task lists to confirm performance improvement

data.taskTitle: Implement performance optimization for task search
Implement performance optimization for task search
Implement performance optimization for task search
Implement performance optimization for task search

summary: Implemented debounce mechanism for task search in ActivityBadge to reduce unnecessary computational overhead
Added early termination strategy to improve search performance and responsiveness
Analyzed and optimized search algorithm's computational complexity

suggestedTasks.title: Add Performance Benchmarking for ActivityBadge Search
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive performance tests to validate the new search optimization strategies. Develop benchmark suite that measures search response times under various dataset sizes and complexity scenarios. Implement comparative metrics to quantify performance improvements and establish baseline performance standards.
suggestedTasks.reason: Validate and document performance optimization effectiveness

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Caching Layer for Task Search Results
suggestedTasks.description: Design and integrate a client-side caching mechanism for task search to further reduce computational overhead. Focus on implementing a memory-efficient cache strategy that can store recent search results and invalidate stale data. Consider using LRU (Least Recently Used) cache approach in the ActivityBadge component.
suggestedTasks.reason: Enhance search performance through result memoization

gotchas: Avoid blocking main thread during search

documentationNeeds: Update performance optimization section in component README
